channel.title: Poss jump not working
channel.description: #### What happened? I was poss and I tried to jump someone. Me and my target both died and kept our numbers in the graveyard. It said I successfully jumped them and their name showed as alive in the player list but their body wasn't at the table and they couldn't be voted for or jailed. #### What was SUPPOSED to happen? A successful poss jump. #### Steps to reproduce: Be poss and jump someone. My jump target was a butler but that probably doesn't matter. #### Comments:

item.title: Poss jump not working
item.dc:creator: Thunal33
item.description:
What happened?

I was poss and I tried to jump someone. Me and my target both died and kept our numbers in the graveyard. It said I successfully jumped them and their name showed as alive in the player list but their body wasn’t at the table and they couldn’t be voted for or jailed.

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

A successful poss jump.

Steps to reproduce:

Be poss and jump someone. My jump target was a butler but that probably doesn’t matter.

Comments:

Read full topic
